databaseAccess

Class DocumentDB

  • java.lang.Object
    • databaseAccess.DocumentDB

  • public class DocumentDB
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Description: Class that establishes a connection and communicates directly with the document table in the database.
    Author:
    Tristen Kreutz

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DocumentDB() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean delete(java.lang.String filePath)
      Establishes a connection with the database and removes the Document from the document table that has a Primary Key matching the filePath being passed into this method.
      Document get(java.lang.String filePath)
      Establishes a connection with the database and selects the Document in the document table that has a Primary Key matching the filePath being passed into this method.
      java.util.ArrayList<Document> getAll()
      Establishes a connection with the database and selects all the Documents within the document table.
      boolean insert(Document doc)
      Establishes a connection with the database and inserts the Document object passed into this method into the document table.
      boolean update(Document doc)
      Establishes a connection with the database and updates the Document in the database table that shares a Primary Key with the Document being passed into this method.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DocumentDB

        public DocumentDB()

    • Method Detail

      • insert

        public boolean insert(Document doc)
        Establishes a connection with the database and inserts the Document object passed into this method into the document table. The Document being inserted must be a part of a Parcel object.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document to insert into the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • update

        public boolean update(Document doc)
        Establishes a connection with the database and updates the Document in the database table that shares a Primary Key with the Document being passed into this method. All values of the Document in the database will be updated with the values of the object being passed assuming constraints are not violated.
        Parameters:
        doc - Document to update in the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • delete

        public boolean delete(java.lang.String filePath)
        Establishes a connection with the database and removes the Document from the document table that has a Primary Key matching the filePath being passed into this method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - filePath of the Document to remove from the database
        Returns:
        boolean based on whether or not the operation was successful

      • get

        public Document get(java.lang.String filePath)
        Establishes a connection with the database and selects the Document in the document table that has a Primary Key matching the filePath being passed into this method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - filePath of the Document to retrieve from the database
        Returns:
        Document that contains the information of the requested Document

      • getAll

        public java.util.ArrayList<Document> getAll()
        Establishes a connection with the database and selects all the Documents within the document table. It then adds them to a newly created ArrayList and returns that to the calling object.
        Returns:
        ArrayList containing all of the Documents from the database
